articles.title: Trump's foreign policies: What do Americans think? - BBC
articles.description: Most Americans do not believe the US should try to take over Greenland or Gaza, a Pew Research survey suggests.
articles.content:
Tiffany Wertheimer
In his first few weeks back in the Oval Office, US President Donald Trump made several extraordinary decisions on foreign policy.
He threatened to annex Greenland, announced plan… [+4111 chars]

articles.author: Paolo Confino
articles.title: Trump’s tariff formula ‘was rigged’ to get higher rates— and it used the wrong value for one of its variables, conservative think tank says - Fortune
articles.description: A report from the American Enterprise Institute showed the White House used the wrong number in its tariff calculations.
